basic.color: Flower color pink, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Deep and well-drained loam or sandy loam containing abundant humus in sunny places
maintenance.sunlight: Resistant to shade, usually grows in valleys or shady places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves timely
